roleset.name: arrange, systematize
roleset.note: CODIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'codify' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from codify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually just transitive
example.text: Shortly afterwards, Mr. Bush imposed a series of anti-China sanctions, including suspension of most high-level talks, which *trace*-1 could be codified *trace*-1 in U.S. congressional legislation in the coming weeks.

example.name: with end state?
example.text: Mary codified her violence towards John into a neat weekly schedule of beatings and other torture.
example.arg: into a neat weekly schedule of beatings and other torture
